resources.string: Fail Retrieve. Quantity submited is unvalid.
Sorry! No family have been assigned To This Ration Card.
The server encountered an unexpected problem. If the problem persist, just close and relaunch the app
Sorry! You are not allowed to serve this Ration Card.
Please check your internet connection and retry.
The quantity wished must be lower than quantity owned!\nQuantity owned is :
One (or many) fields are empty. Please fill out this (or these) fields before continue the supply process
You must choose at least one product before continue the supply process
There are one or many quantities seized which are over than quantities owned. Please check errors dialogs to fix it
Please wait… this step may take a minute or more.
This family has nothing in its portfolio. You cannot continue the distribution process
No picture have been taken for this transaction. Please take a picture before completing transaction.
Position cannot be localized. Please Check your location Sharing in Device Settings and Retry.
Position cannot be localized. So, the transaction cannot be completed. Please Check your location Sharing in Device Settings and Retry.
The request doesn\'t reach the server, retry
Your Sim Card need to be updated
Sorry! this phone is not NFC Capable
